title: The Dawn of the shadow
description: One day and it all changed, one day and the world changed. Pete Farrell was just a kid who was in love with the girl of his dreams but didnt know how to win. For all his life he lived in the shadow of his friends Tim and Mark but one day it changed with the finding of a machine. Lost for centuries the machine contained within it DNA that could change ordinary to extraordinary. Pete steps out from the shadows showing a side of himself he never knew. Along with this new strength comes a darkness that strikes against his friends and family. Forced to a decision by an ancient enemy Pete takes the road of a hero using his darkness to help those lost within their own. In the end Pete steps forward taking the name of his darkness "Shadow" to fight against all those who would bring evil into this world. Darkness rises....The Shadow Falls...Light remains
author: Peter   Kelly
